data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
The trading window for dealing in securities of the company for the promoters directors designated persons shall remain closed from the 01st of January 2026 until completion of 48 hours from the declaration of the unaudited financial results (standalone & consolidated) for the period ending on the 31st of December 2025.

The date of board meeting for the declaration of unaudited financial results (standalone & consolidated) for the period ending on 31st December 2025 shall be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results(Standalone & Consolidated)
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30(2) and 33 read with Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 we hereby intimate your good selves that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Monday the 11th August 2025 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated & Standalone) for the first quarter i.e for the period 01-04-2025 to 30-06-2025 along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s JMT & Associates. We wish to inform you that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors herein is a qualified opinion and since these results are unaudited statement of impact of audit qualifications is not applicable.
Time of Start of the meeting  : 11.00 am
Time of End of the meeting  : 2.30 pm
This is for your kind information and dissemination.

data.caption: Clarification On Price Movement Of Shares Of The Company
data.news_body:
We wish to clarify that there is no unpublished event/information/announcement relating to operations/performance of the company which is required to be disclosed to the stock exchange under Regulation 30 of SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015 that may have a bearing on the price of the shares of the company.

WE further request you to take note that since the shares of the company are freely traded on the stock exchange the company is unable to comment on the increase in price of the shares of the company.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Orchasp Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Orchasp Ltd on April 04 2025 with reference to Movement in Price.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Pursuant to SEBI(PIT) Regulations 2015 and any amendments thereto and in terms of the code of conduct adopted by the company the trading window for dealing in the companys securities for all directors promoters designated persons including dependents and immediate relatives shall remain closed with effect from 01-04-2025 till 48 hours after declaration of Audited Financial Results(Standalone & Consolidated) for the fourth quarter and year ended 31st March 2025.

Further pursuant to SEBI circular SEBI/HO/ISD-PoD-2?P/CIR/2023/124 dated 19th July 2023 the company has ensured freezing the PAN of all designated Persons and their immediate relatives during the Trading window closure period.

The date of board meeting for declaration of Audited Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the fourth quarter and year ended on 31st March 2025 will be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Discrepancy Raised On Delay In Intimation Of Resignation Filed On 09Th January 2025
data.news_body: We wish to clarify that the Resignation letter of Dri K.Koteswara Rao (DIN 06401491) the Director was received at our office on the 09th of January 2025 and hence we could not file the Intimation of Resignation within 24 hours of effective date.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Director

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Modification/Rectification Of Share Allotment
data.news_body: The Board at its meeting today has taken note of the Listing Approval from BSE for allotment of 14,52,79,145 Equity Shares upon conversion of FCCBs and modified/rectified the earlier resolution passed on 11-09-2024, allotting the shares for the conversion of FCCBs

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Taking Note Of Listing Approval Of BSE And Modification Of Resolution
data.news_body: Orchasp Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 06/12/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve 1. To take on record the Listing Approval of the BSE Limited dated 02nd December 2024 pertaining to allotment of 14,52,79,145 Equity Shares of Rs.2/- each consequent to conversion of 67 Nos FCCBs2. To modify/rectify the board resolution adopted by the company on the 11th September 2024 allotting  15,61,20,873 equity shares of Rs.2/- each, towards conversion of FCCBS along with interest accrued , to give effect to the rectification suggested by BSE and restrict the allotment to 14,52,79,145 equity shares of Rs.2/- each3. To take on record the interest accrued on FCCBs

data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI(PIT) Regulations, 2015 and in terms of code of conduct adopted by the company , the trading window for dealing in the company''s securities for all directors, promoters, including dependents and immediate relatives, shall remain closed with effect from 01-10-2024 till 48 hours after declaration of Unaudited Financial Results(Standalone & Consolidated) of the company for the second quarter and half year i.e six months ending 30th September 2024The date of board meeting for declaration of unaudited financial results of the company for the second quarter and half year i.e six months period ending 30th September 2024, will be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Allotment Of Equity Shares Consequent To Conversion Of 1 % Unsecured Fccbs
data.news_body: A meeting of the board was held today, the 11th September 2024 through VC/OAVM and the board thus considered and approved1. The allotment of 15,61,20,873 ( Fifteen Crore Sixty One Lakh Twenty Thousand Eight Hundred and Seventy Three ) Equity Shares of Face value Rs.2/- each of the company to the Bond Holders , upon receipt of conversion notice from the bond holders for conversion of 67 Nos, 1% Unsecured Foreign Currency Convertible Bonds,(FCCBs) of US$ 100,000 each along with accrued interest (Converted at 1 US$=INR 83.4813) based on the terms laid out in the roll over term sheet dated 05th July 2023, at an issue price of Rs 3.85/- (Rupees Three and Paise Eighty Five Only) , calculated based on the pricing formulae as prescribed in the SEBI(ICDR) Regulations.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: we wish to inform you that we submitted our 30th Annual Report on the 05th September 2024.We have noticed a typographical error on the cover page of the annual report and have rectified the error . The details of the corrections are as underIncorrect Title Page    Annual Report 2024-2025Correct Title pageAnnual Report 2023-2024We  submit that the error was due to oversight , unintentional and is not detrimental to the interest of the shareholders in any manner.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the 30th Annual Report  in accordance with Reg 34(1) of SEBI(LODR)  Regulations,2015

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 05-09-2024 At 11.00 Am At The Registered And Corporate Office
data.news_body: The Board has considered and approved the following: 1. Re-appointment of Mr. K.Koteswara Rao as Non-Independent & Non-Executive Director of the company.2. Re-appointment of Mr. B.V.B.Ravi Kishore as an Independent Director of the company.3. Notice of 30th AGM containing Balance Sheet, Profit and Loss Account (Standalone & Consolidated) for the year ended 31st March 2024 along with Auditors Report, Board's Report, Corporate Governance Report & Management Discussion & Analysis4. Appointment of Ms.T.Durga Pallavi, Company Secretary as Secretarial Auditor for the ensuing year 5. Appointment of Ms.T.Durga Pallavi, Company Secretary as the Scrutinizer for evoting.7.(a) Date of 30th Annual General Meeting : Monday, 30th September 2024 at 10.30 am thru     VC/OAVM.   (b) Book Closure Date : 24-09-2024 to 30-09-2024,    (c) Record Date : 20-09-2024 &    (d) E voting dates 27-09-2024 at 10.00 am to 29-09-2024 up to 5.00pmThe meeting commenced at 11.00 am and concluded at 12.15 pm

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Approving Notice Of 30Th Annual General Meeting
data.news_body: Orchasp Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 05/09/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve 1. To approve Loan Agreement Cum Memorandum of         Understanding with Apptest Corporation.2. To Approve the Notice of 30th Annual General Meeting         along with Board's Report, Corporate Governance Report ,         Management Discussion and Analysis etc.3. To Re-appoint Directors retiring by rotation.4. To Appoint a Secretarial Auditor for the ensuing period.5. To Appoint a Scrutinizer for the e voting Process.6. To fix Record Date, Book Closure date and E voting dates          etc7. To consider any other matter with the permission of the         Board.

data.caption: Redemption Of 1 % Unsecured Fccbs
data.news_body: In accordance with Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, we wish to inform the members that the bond holders have exercised their option to convert the balance Foreign Currency Convertible Bonds (FCCBs) outstanding along with interest accrued, into equity shares of Rs.2/- (Rupees Two) each at applicable price as per SEBI (ICDR) Regulations and the terms spelt out in the roll over term sheet.Hence all the FCCBs outstanding along with accrued interest are thus being redeemed in full by conversion into fully paid equity shares of the company

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (PIT) Regulations 2015, and any amendments thereto the trading window for all director, promoters, desigated persons, including dependents and immediate relatives, shall remain closed from 01-07-2024  till 48 hours after declaration of Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results for the first quarter ended 30th June 2024.The date for declaration of unaudited quarterly financial results for the first quarter ended 30th June 2024 shall be intimated in due course

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: The Board at its meeting held today the 15th June 2024 as appointed M/s JMT & Associates as Statutory Auditor of the Company in the casual vacancy arisen due to resignation of the previous auditor.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: The Company has convened a Meeting of the members of the Board on the 15th June 2024 at 11.00 am at the registered and corporate office of the company to approve inter alia the following items of agenda(a) Appointment of M.s JMT & Associates , Chartered Accountants, Mumbai as the statutory auditors of the company  to fill the casual vacancy arisen due to resignation of previous auditors, upto the conclusion of the ensuing Annual General Meeting of the company(b) Authorisation to Mr.P.Chandra Sekhar, Managing Director       & CFO of the company to file necessary compliances and      to do all that is necessary for this purpose

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting To Appoint Statutory Auditors
data.news_body: Orchasp Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 15/06/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve The company proposes a meeting of the members of the board (a) to appoint M/s JMT & Associates, Chartered Accountants, Mumbai, as statutory auditors of the company to fill up the casual vacancy arisen due to resignation of the previous auditor, to hold office until conclusion of the ensuing Annual General Meeting(b) To Authorise Mr.P.Chandra Sekhar to file necessary compliance and to do all that is necessary for this purpose

data.news_body: We are here with submitting the sanned images of the Audited Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2024 published in the following News Papers on 3rd May 2024(a) Business Standard(b)Nava Telangana

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March 2024
data.news_body: The Board Approved(a) Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Year Ended 31st March 2024(b) Allotment of 2,44,29,863 Equity Shares of Rs. 2/- each for an issue price of Rs.4.10(Rupees Four and Paise Ten Only) including a premium of Rs.2.10(Rupees Two and Paise Ten Only) upon conversion of 12 Nos Foreign Currency Convertible Bonds (FCCBs) of USD 1,00,000 each to Bond Holders(c) Appointed Mr. P.Chandra Sekhar (DIN 01647212) Managing Director as the Chairman of the Company

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March 2024
data.news_body: The Board Approved(a) Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Year Ended 31st March 2024(b) Allotment of 2,44,29,863 Equity Shares of Rs. 2/- each for an issue price of Rs.4.10(Rupees Four and Paise Ten Only) including a premium of Rs.2.10(Rupees Two and Paise Ten Only) upon conversion of 12 Nos Foreign Currency Convertible Bonds (FCCBs) of USD 1,00,000 each to Bond Holders(c) Appointed Mr. P.Chandra Sekhar (DIN 01647212) Managing Director as the Chairman of the Company

data.caption: Submission Of Compliance Certificate Under Regulation 40(9)
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the Compliance Certificate under Reg 40(9) for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2024

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Audited Results
data.news_body: Orchasp Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 02/05/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve (1) Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended on 31st March 2024(2) Allotment of Equity Shares to bond holders (FCCB''s) consequent to seeking conversion of bonds into equity shares

data.caption: Compliances-Compliance Certificate Under Reg 7(3) For The Period Ended 31St March 2024
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting compliance certificate pursuant to Reg 7(3) of the SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015, for the period ended 31st March 2024.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the Certificate under Reg 74(5) of SEBI(DP) Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended 31st March 2024.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI(PIT) Regulations 2015 and any amendments there to, the trading window for dealing in the company''s securities for all directors, promoters, designated persons including dependents and immediate relatives shall remain closed with effect from 01-04-2024 till 48 hours after declaration of Audited Quarterly and Annual Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter ending 31st March 2024

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancy In Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 13-02-2024
data.news_body: We are here with submitting the outcome of the board meeting with time of commencement of the board meeting and conclusion of the board  meeting

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: With reference to regulation 47(1) r/w regulation 33 of the SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015, we are herewith submitting the copies of newspaper advertisements published to inform members of about the unaudited financial results(consolidated & standalone) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2023 in (a) Business Standard and (b) Nava Telangana

data.caption: Revision Of Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: We have noticed an error in our outcome of board meeting submitted earlier today pertaining to date of board meeting in the subject .We are submitting our revised outcome

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Submission Of Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results (Standalone& Consolidated) For The Third Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2023
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the Outcome of the Board Meeting held today i.e 13th February 2024 under Regulation 30(2) read with Part A of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 along with Unaudited Quarterly and Ninemonths ended Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the period ended 31st December 2023

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Unaudited Results (Standalone & Consolidated) And Considering Eligibility For NSE Listing
data.news_body: Orchasp Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve (a) Unaudited Quarterly and Nine Months ended Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the period ended 31st December 2023 along with Limited Review Report issued by M/s P.C.N Associates.(b) Eligibility for Direct Listing of the Equity Shares of the Company on the National Stock Exchange (NSE)

data.caption: Company Update
data.news_body: We are submitting an update on an MOU entered by the Company for sourcing and executing services for a period of two years

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the certificate of compliance under Reg 74(5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018, issued by our RTA.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI(PIT) Regulations,2015 and any amendments thereto, and in terms of code of conduct adopted by the company, the trading window for dealing in the company''s securities for all designated persons, shall remain closed with effect from 01st January 2024 till 48 hours after the declaration of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the company for the third quarter and nine months period ending 31st December 2023.The date of board meeting for declaration of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone& Consolidated) of the company for the third quarter and nine months period ending on 31st December 2023, will be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting copies of News Paper Publication of our Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results(Standalone & Consolidated) for the period ended 30th September 2023

data.caption: Results - Unaudited Quarterly And Halfyearly Financial Results-Standalone And Consolidated
data.news_body: The Board at its meeting held today, i.e 14th November 2023 has approved the Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results-Standalone & Consolidated for the period ended 30th September 2023.We are submitting the Limited Review Report Issued by M/s P C N Associates along with Unaudited Results (Standalone & Consolidated), Cash Flow Statement(Standalone & Consolidated), Statement of Assets& Liabilities (Standalone & Consolidated)

data.caption: Results - Unaudited Quarterly And Halfyearly Financial Results-Standalone And Consolidated
data.news_body: The Board at its meeting held today, i.e 14th November 2023 has approved the Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results-Standalone & Consolidated for the period ended 30th September 2023.We are submitting the Limited Review Report Issued by M/s P C N Associates along with Unaudited Results (Standalone & Consolidated), Cash Flow Statement(Standalone & Consolidated), Statement of Assets& Liabilities (Standalone & Consolidated)

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated & Standalone)
data.news_body: Orchasp Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/11/2023 ,inter alia, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated & Standalone) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2023 along with Limited Review Report of M.s PCN Associates

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Allotment Of Equity Shares On A Preferential Allotment Basis
data.news_body: The meeting of the board was held today and the board approved (a) Allotment of 2,00,00,000 Equity Shares of Rs. 2/- each on a Preferential Basis at an issue price of Rs.3.20/- per Share to Mrs.P.Rajeswari, legal heir of Mr.P.C.Pantulu, ex-chairman & CEO of the company towards conversion of his Loan Dues.(b) Authorised Mr.P.Chandra Sekhar, MD & CFO to make necessary application for issuing, allotment, obtaining listing & trading permission and other compliances

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Thursday, the 10th day of August 2023 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved
(a) The Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated & Standalone) for the first quarter i.e., for the period 01-04-2023 to 30-06-2023 along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s PCN Associates.
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) (d) of the SEBI(LODR) Regulations,2015, the Board declares that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors is an Unmodified opinion.
(b) Appointment of Ms.T.Durga Pallavi ( M.No 23864, CP No 19724 & Peer Review Certificate No 3876/2023) as secretarial Auditor in place of Mr.Y.Koteswara Rao . The change in Secretarial Auditor is on account of non -availability of Mr.Y.Koteswara Rao.

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancies
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting Statement of Impact on Audit Qualifications for the discrepancy raised in our submission of Audited Financial Results(Standalone & Consolidated) for the period ended 31st March 2023

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Fourth Quarter And Year To Date Results For The Period 01-04-2022 To 31-03-2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30(2) and 33 read with Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015, we hereby intimate your good selves that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Friday, the 26th day of May 2023 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved the Audited Financial Results (Consolidated & Standalone) for the fourth quarter and year to date results for the period 01-04-2022 to 31-03-2023 along with the Audit Report issued by M/s PCN Associates.
Further, we are herewith enclosing Audited (Consolidated & Standalone) statement of assets and Liabilities , cashflow statements.
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) (d) of the SEBI(LODR) Regulations,2015, the Board declares that the Audit report issued by the Auditors is a modified opinion, hence we are enclosing a statement on the Impact of Audit Qualifications.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting-Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results Q3 2022-23
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Friday, the 10th day of February 2023 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved the following:
1. The Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated & Standalone) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2022 along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s PCN Associates.
2. We confirm that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors herein is an Unmodified Opinion.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Submission Of Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated & Standalone)
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Friday, the 11th November 2022 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved
1. The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2022 along with the recommendation from the Audit Committee and the Auditors Report issued by M/s P C N & Associates.
2. We confirm that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors herein is an Unmodified opinion.
3. The Board has deferred the issue of Equity Shares to Mr. P.C.Pantulu , Promoter of the Company, on Preferential basis and it will be taken up again at an appropriate time ,which will be communicated to the Stock Exchanges in due course.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting 02/2022-23
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30(2) and 33 read with Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015, we hereby intimate your good selves that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Saturday, the 13th August 2022 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved the following:
1. The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June 2022 along with the recommendation from the Audit Committee and the Auditors Report issued by M/s P C N & Associates.
2. We confirm that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors herein is an Unmodified opinion.
This is for your kind information and dissemination.

data.caption: Results -Financial (Standalone&Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March 2022
data.news_body:
We are herewith submitting the outcome of the Board Meeting 01/2022-23 along with Audited Financial Results approved at the meeting.

This is for your kind information and dissemenation

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Submission Of Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Friday, the 11th day of February 2022 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved the following:
1. The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 31st December 2022 along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s PCN Associates.
2. We confirm that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors herein is an Unmodified Opinion.

This is for your kind information and dissemination.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Submission Of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Wednesday, the 10th day of November 2021 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved the following:
1. The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th September 2021 along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s P. Murali & Co.
2. We confirm that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors herein is an Unmodified Opinion.

3. Change in Constitution of Committees of the Board as follows with effect from 10th November 2021

4.The Board has taken note and approved the resignation of Mr.Suraj Bharadwaj and placed on record his contribution during the board and committee meetings.

This is for your kind information and dissemination.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting- Unaudited Quarterly Financial Results
data.news_body:
We hereby intimate your good selves that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Friday, the 13th day of August 2021 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved the following:
1. The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June 2021 along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s P. Murali & Co.
2. We confirm that the Limited Review Report issued by the Auditors herein is an Unmodified Opinion.
This is for your kind information and dissemination.

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancy In Submission Of Audited Financial Results-Consolidated For The Period Ended 31St March 2021
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting our declaration for Unmodified Opinion on the Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021 under regulation 33/52

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancy In Submission Of Audited Financial Results-Standalone For The Period Ended 31St March 2021
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting our declaration for Unmodified Opinion on the Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021 under regulation 33/52

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30(2) and 33 read with Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015, we hereby intimate your good selves that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Monday, the 28th day of June 2021 at the Registered and Corporate Office of the Company, considered and approved the following:
1. The Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and Year ended 31st March 2021 along with the recommendation from the Audit Committee and the Auditors Report issued by M/s P. Murali & Co.
2. Appointment of Mr.B.V.B.Ravi Kishore (DIN:03271596) as an Additional Director.

This is for your kind information and dissemination.

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancy-Submission Of Consolidated Cashflow Statement For The Quarter And Six Months Ended 30Th September 2020
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the Cashflow Statement for Consolidated Results in PDF for the quarter and half ended 30th September 2020 under regulation 33/52, rectifying the discrepancy.

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancy-Submission Of Standalone Cashflow Statement For The Quarter And Six  Months Ended 30Th September 2020
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the Cashflow Statement for Standalone Results in PDF for the quarter and half ended 30th September 2020 under regulation 33/52, rectifying the discrepancy.

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancy-Submission Of Consolidated Cash Flow Statement For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March 2020
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the Cashflow Statement for Consolidated Results in PDF for the quarter ended March 2020 under regulation 33/52, rectifying the discrepancy

data.caption: Rectification Of Discrepancy In Submission Of Audited Financial Results For The Period Ended 31St March 2020
data.news_body: We are herewith submitting the rectified results sheet pertaining to Consolidated  Financial Results for quarter ended 31st March 2020 under regulation 33/52 rectifying the totalling errors in the Net Profit Figure and Total Comprehensive Income figure.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting 03/2020-21
data.news_body:
Board Approved the following
(a) Audited Results 31-03-2020
(b) Unaudited Results 30-06-2020
(c) Unaudited Results 30-09-2020
(d) Unaudited Results 31-12-2020
(e) Resignation of Ms.C.Kamakshi Bharathi Independant Director
(f) Appointment of Ms.G.Ponnari as Additional Director
